subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: James L. Dolan, the Knicks’ owner, will not face discipline from the N.B.A. over an email in which he told a fan to start following the Nets “because the Knicks don’t want you.”
snippet: James L. Dolan, the Knicks’ owner, will not face discipline from the N.B.A. over an email in which he told a fan to start following the Nets “because the Knicks don’t want you.”
